org.apache.hadoop.conf

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SequenceFileInputFilter.Filter, Tool
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMapWritable, Balancer, ChecksumDistributedFileSystem, ChecksumFileSystem, CompositeRecordReader, Configured, DataNode, DefaultCodec, DFSAdmin, DFSck, DistributedFileSystem, DistributedPentomino, FileSystem, FilterFileSystem, FsShell, FTPFileSystem, GenericWritable, Grep, GzipCodec, HarFileSystem, HftpFileSystem, HsftpFileSystem, InMemoryFileSystem, InnerJoinRecordReader, JobClient, JobShell, Join, JoinRecordReader, KosmosFileSystem, LocalFileSystem, LzoCodec, MapWritable, MigrationTool, MultiFileWordCount, MultiFilterRecordReader, NativeS3FileSystem, ObjectWritable, OuterJoinRecordReader, OverrideRecordReader, PiEstimator, RandomTextWriter, RandomWriter, RawLocalFileSystem, S3FileSystem, ScriptBasedMapping, SequenceFileInputFilter.FilterBase, SequenceFileInputFilter.MD5Filter, SequenceFileInputFilter.PercentFilter, SequenceFileInputFilter.RegexFilter, SerializationFactory, SleepJob, SocksSocketFactory, Sort, SortedMapWritable, Trash, WordCount, WritableSerialization

    public interface Configurable
    Something that may be configured with a Configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration getConf()
      Return the configuration used by this object.
      void setConf(Configuration conf)
      Set the configuration to be used by this object.
